name: sleepwalking
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of getting out of bed and walking around while you are sleeping: Sleepwalking is normal and children typically grow out of the habit around age 12. Doctors say sleepwalking is more common than most people realize. See
sleepwalker
More examplesFewer examplesThe drug has been associated with side effects such as sleepwalking and confusion. The exact cause of sleepwalking is still unknown.Complaints of chronic insomnia and sleepwalking were the most common reasons for referral.
